name: be dog do borks
description:
Take a few minutes and destress, recharge your mental health with this cute litttle doggo simulator about barking and chewing on stuff. 

Features
  • be the goodest boy/girl waiting for their owner to come back to the park.
  • find your favorite things and give them a a good chomp or two.
  • do the borks.
  • ??? pet the dog ???
Credits

Made in 2.5 days for Ryan's lil Jam 2 by:

@heyits5am - Design, Programming
@tinyruin - 3D Art + Level Design + UI
@SophGarth - 3D Art + Character + Animation
@PeachValkyrie - 3D Art + 2D Art
@BroduxOfficial - Music + SFX
